participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Optimistic and determined, she approaches life with a positive mindset and a strong will.
participant_1.background: I am a clean eater. My parents were both very athletic. I love running and preparing for marathons. I am a cancer survivor.

participant_2.name: Max
participant_2.personality: Introverted and quirky, he prefers solitude but has a brilliant mind and innovative ideas.
participant_2.background: I helped design the game Starcraft. I am a recluse. I am working on building a robot to be my body double. I am a famous twitch streamer.
